author: cecilia_was_here
content:
Hey Guys, 

The Ethereum Foundation is hiring a Research Engineer to work on the proof-of-stake consensus layer. If this sounds like you or someone you know, learn more by following the link here: https://ethereum.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=48
